For best experience we recommend the following aspect ratios and resolutions -Common 16:9 resolutions: 1280x720, 1600x900, 1920x1080, 2560x1440, 3840x2160. -Common 16:10 resolutions: 1280x800, 1440x900, 1680x1050, 1920×1200 -Common 21:9 resolutions: 2560x1080, 3440x1440.
